content.question: All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: The curve begins at a point (negative 1 comma 3). The curve trends down to the right gradually then more steeply, through the point (negative 0.5 comma 1), and levels to reach a minimum point at (negative 1 comma 0). The curve trends up to the right gradually then more steeply, through the point (0.5 comma 1), and levels to reach a maximum point at (1 comma 3). The curve trends down to the right gradually then more steeply, through the point (1.5 comma 1), and levels to reach a minimum point at (2 comma negative 1). The curve trends up to the right gradually then more steeply, through the point (2.5 comma 1), and levels to end at (3 comma 3). ​The graph of the function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given.
